content:
TypeUsage Class

Definition

Describes a type and a set of facets for that type.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public sealed class TypeUsage : System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem
Inheritance
Object
MetadataItem
TypeUsage
Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Inherited Members

Documentation

GetGeneralFacetDescriptions()
MetadataProperties

Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()

MemberwiseClone()

Properties

BuiltInTypeKind

Gets the built-in type kind for this TypeUsage.

public override System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind BuiltInTypeKind { get; }
Value
BuiltInTypeKind

A BuiltInTypeKind object that represents the built-in type kind for this TypeUsage.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

EdmType

Gets the type information described by this TypeUsage.

public System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType EdmType { get; }
Value
EdmType

An EdmType object that represents the type information described by this TypeUsage.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Facets

Gets the list of facets for the type that is described by this TypeUsage.

public System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.Facet> Facets { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyMetadataCollection<Facet>

A collection of type stem.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1 that contains the list of facets for the type that is described by this TypeUsage.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Methods

CreateBinaryTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Boolean)

Creates a TypeUsage object to describe a binary type by using the specified facet values.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateBinaryTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, bool isFixedLength);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

A PrimitiveType for which the TypeUsage object is created.

isFixedLength
Boolean

true to set the length of the binary type to fixed; otherwise, false.

Returns
TypeUsage

A TypeUsage object describing a binary type by using the specified facet values.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

For more information about the binary types, see Binary (EDM).

CreateBinaryTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Boolean, Int32)

Creates a TypeUsage object to describe a binary type by using the specified facet values.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateBinaryTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, bool isFixedLength, int maxLength);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

A PrimitiveType for which the TypeUsage object is created.

isFixedLength
Boolean

true to set the length of the binary type to fixed; otherwise, false.

maxLength
Int32

The maximum length of the binary type.

Returns
TypeUsage

A TypeUsage object describing a binary type by using the specified facet values.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

For more information about the binary types, see Binary (EDM).

CreateDateTimeOffsetTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Nullable<Byte>)

Creates a stem.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeOffsetTypeUsage object of the type that the parameters describe.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDateTimeOffsetTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, Nullable<byte> precision);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the offset.

precision
Nullable<Byte>

The degree of granularity of the stem.DateTimeOffset in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported. For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.

Returns
TypeUsage

A stem.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeOffsetTypeUsage object.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

CreateDateTimeTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Nullable<Byte>)

Creates a stem.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeTypeUsage object of the type that the parameters describe.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDateTimeTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, Nullable<byte> precision);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the stem.DateTime object.

precision
Nullable<Byte>

The degree of granularity of the stem.DateTimeOffset in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported. For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.

Returns
TypeUsage

A stem.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeTypeUsage object.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

CreateDecimalTypeUsage(PrimitiveType)

Creates a TypeUsage object to describe a decimal type with unbounded precision and scale facet values.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDecimalTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

A PrimitiveType for which the TypeUsage object is created.

Returns
TypeUsage

A TypeUsage object describing a decimal type with unbounded precision and scale facet values.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

For more information about the decimal types, see Decimal(EDM).

CreateDecimalTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Byte, Byte)

Creates a TypeUsage object to describe a decimal type by using the specified facet values.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDecimalTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, byte precision, byte scale);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

A PrimitiveType for which the TypeUsage object is created.

precision
Byte

The precision of the decimal type as type Byte.

scale
Byte

The scale of the decimal type as type Byte.

Returns
TypeUsage

A TypeUsage object describing a decimal type by using the specified facet values.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

For more information about the decimal types, see Decimal(EDM).

CreateDefaultTypeUsage(EdmType)

Creates a TypeUsage object with the specified conceptual model type.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDefaultTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType edmType);
Parameters
edmType
EdmType

A EdmType for which the TypeUsage object is created.

Returns
TypeUsage

A TypeUsage object with the default facet values for the specified EdmType.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

If the edmType is a primitive type, such as String, Decimal, Binary or DateTime, this method invokes one of the corresponding methods declared in the TypeUsage class. Otherwise, it creates a TypeUsage object with the specified EdmType directly.

CreateStringTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Boolean, Boolean)

Creates a TypeUsage object to describe a string type by using the specified facet values and unbounded MaxLength.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateStringTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, bool isUnicode, bool isFixedLength);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

A PrimitiveType for which the TypeUsage object is created.

isUnicode
Boolean

true to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, false.

isFixedLength
Boolean

true to set the length of the string type to fixed; otherwise, false

Returns
TypeUsage

A TypeUsage object describing a string type by using the specified facet values and unbounded MaxLength.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

For more information about the string types, see String (EDM).

CreateStringTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Boolean, Boolean, Int32)

Creates a TypeUsage object to describe a string type by using the specified facet values.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateStringTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, bool isUnicode, bool isFixedLength, int maxLength);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

A PrimitiveType for which the TypeUsage object is created.

isUnicode
Boolean

true to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, false.

isFixedLength
Boolean

true to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, false.

maxLength
Int32

true to set the length of the string type to fixed; otherwise, false.

Returns
TypeUsage

A TypeUsage object describing a string type by using the specified facet values.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

For more information about the string types, see String (EDM).

CreateTimeTypeUsage(PrimitiveType, Nullable<Byte>)

Creates a stem.Data.Metadata.Edm.TimeTypeUsage object of the type that the parameters describe.

public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateTimeTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, Nullable<byte> precision);
Parameters
primitiveType
PrimitiveType

The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the stem.DateTime object.

precision
Nullable<Byte>

The degree of granularity of the stem.DateTimeOffset in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported. For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.

Returns
TypeUsage

A stem.Data.Metadata.Edm.TimeTypeUsage object.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

IsSubtypeOf(TypeUsage)

Checks whether this TypeUsage is a subtype of the specified TypeUsage.

public bool IsSubtypeOf (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage typeUsage);
Parameters
typeUsage
TypeUsage

The TypeUsage object to be checked.

Returns
Boolean

true if this TypeUsage is a subtype of the specified TypeUsage; otherwise, false.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

ToString()

Returns the full name of the type described by this TypeUsage.

public override string ToString ();
Returns
String

The full name of the type described by this TypeUsage as string.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute
